department.dept_long_name: Department of East Asian Languages and Civilizations

course.course_group: East Asian Film and Media Studies
course.title: Rip and Tear--The Body as Moving and Moved Image in Japanese Film: Seminar
course.meeting_text: M., 2–5; and a weekly film screening W., 7–9.
course.description: This course traces the role of the body as a discursive anchor in moving image culture in Japan. The focus will lie on the period after WW II, although the mapping of historical contexts will entail investigations into earlier histories as well.
